spell_tooltip.description:
When targets afflicted by your Virulent Plague are healed, you are also healed for 5% of the amount. 

In addition, your Virulent Plague now erupts for 400% of normal eruption damage when dispelled.
Your Death's Due rots enemies each time it deals damage, absorbing healing equal to 100% of damage dealt.
Sudden Doom also causes your next Death Coil to burst up to 2 Festering Wounds and reduce the target's movement speed by 45% per burst. Lasts 3 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 59,949 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a geist to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one geist at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Scourge Strike hits up to 7 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 18.4 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
The amount absorbed by Anti-Magic Zone is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.

Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by 80% for 4 sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.

While active, your movement speed cannot be reduced below 170%.

Strike an enemy for 121,691 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 554,072 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 126,972 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 643,677 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.

Strikes for 148,965 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 47,742 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 77,407 Physical damage and 69,570 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a geist to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one geist at a time.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil or Epidemic cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your geist deals 78,175 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. Granting them 100% energy and the geist's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Increases your maximum Runic Power by 10 and increases the Rune regeneration rate of Runic Corruption by 10%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing 290,186 Shadow damage to all enemies over 10 sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit 7 enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size and deals increased damage.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 60,738 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Every 20 Festering Wound you burst empowers your next Festering Strike to become Festering Scythe for 12 sec.

Festering Scythe
Sweep through all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, dealing 354,775 Shadow damage and infecting them with 2-3 Festering Wounds.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Diseases deal 12% more damage over time in half the duration.
Bursting a Festering Wound deals 16% more damage, and deals 28,395 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Death Coil deals 15% additional damage and seeks out 1 additional nearby enemy.
Sudden Doom triggers 30% more often, can accumulate up to 2 charges, and increases the damage of your next Death Coil by 20% or Epidemic by 10%.
Dark Transformation creates an unholy pact between you and your pet, igniting flaming chains that deal 389,611 Shadow damage over 15 sec to enemies between you and your pet.
Death and Decay damage has a 10% chance to apply a Festering Wound to the enemy.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional 30% of the direct damage dealt over 4 sec.
Sudden Doom causes your next Death Coil to also increase your Scourge Strike damage against the target by 60% for 10 sec.

Death Coil and Epidemic debilitate your enemy applying Death Rot causing them to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 10% from you for 10 sec. If Death Coil or Epidemic consume Sudden Doom it applies two stacks of Death Rot.
Diseased enemies take 2% increased damage from you per disease they are affected by.
Popping a Festering Wound increases your Strength by 2% for 20 sec stacking. Multiple instances may overlap.
Your Virulent Plague also applies Frost Fever and Blood Plague at 75% effectiveness.
Strike your target dealing 221,506 Shadow damage, infecting the target with 4 Festering Wounds and sending you into an Unholy Frenzy increasing all damage done by 20% for 20 sec.

Your Death Coil, Epidemic and Death Strike have a 25% chance to make your next Scourge Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for 2% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 7.0% for 20 sec.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by 5% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by 5%.

Your Leech is increased by 2%.

While Lichborne is active, the Leech bonus of this effect is increased by 100%, and it affects 4 allies within 12 yds.

When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Virulent Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by 3 sec, and deals 10% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Scourge Strike consumes the disease to deal 100% of their remaining damage to the target.
Essence of the Blood Queen stacks 2 additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by 5% per stack.

Vampiric Strike has a chance to summon a Blood Beast to attack your enemy for 10 sec.

Each time the Blood Beast attacks, it stores a portion of the damage dealt. When the Blood Beast dies, it explodes, dealing 20% of the damage accumulated to nearby enemies and healing the Death Knight for the same amount. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
When Sudden Doom is consumed, you gain 8% Strength for 5 sec.

Vampiric Strike and Scourge Strike cause your targets to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 5% for 15 sec.

Vampiric Strike benefits from Incite Terror at 400% effectiveness.
You store 25% of all Shadow damage dealt into your Blood Beast to explode for additional damage when it expires.

While Dark Transformation is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by 100%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Scourge Strike for the duration.
